version_description:
我们修复了一些漏洞并且提高了应用程序的性能，您可以更好的体验Bazaart。
 
如果你喜欢Bazaart,请在AppStore给好评！谢谢。

Bazaart团队

• Print gorgeous greeting cards and gifts using your own designs!
• Get festive with free Christmas themed templates <3
• Use beautiful and free Christmas inspired fonts. Yeepee!!!
• Apply amazing and free Xmas backgrounds :)
• Celebrate the season with Christmas and New Year’s designer artwork.
• 通过Bazaart使用来自Adobe的出色免费照片编辑工具
• 我们修复了一些漏洞并且提高了应用程序的性能，您可以更好的体验Bazaart。
 
如果你喜欢Bazaart,请在AppStore给好评！谢谢。

圣诞节快乐！
Bazaart团队

• Print gorgeous greeting cards and gifts using your own designs!
• Get festive with free Christmas themed templates <3
• Use beautiful and free Christmas inspired fonts. Yeepee!!!
• Apply amazing and free Xmas backgrounds :)
• Celebrate the season with Christmas and New Year’s designer artwork.
• 通过Bazaart使用来自Adobe的出色免费照片编辑工具
• 我们修复了一些漏洞并且提高了应用程序的性能，您可以更好的体验Bazaart。
 
如果你喜欢Bazaart,请在AppStore给好评！谢谢。

圣诞节快乐！
Bazaart团队

我们修复了一些漏洞并且提高了应用程序的性能，您可以更好的体验Bazaart。
 
如果你喜欢Bazaart,请在AppStore给好评！谢谢。

Bazaart团队

我们修复了一些漏洞并且提高了应用程序的性能，您可以更好的体验Bazaart。
 
如果你喜欢Bazaart,请在AppStore给好评！谢谢。

Bazaart团队

我们很高兴带给你我们最大的更新。借助廣色域的力量和全新的64位canvas引擎，你會享受你從前從沒有看到過的華麗的充滿活力的顏色。最先進的創作工具，更快的處理時間，無與倫比的簡潔幫助你創作美麗的編輯，華麗的照片和震撼人心的拼貼。准備好發現無限的創造性。

• 在iPad Pro, iPhone 7和7Plus上用完全的广色域进行编辑
• 在iPad上享受多任务：滑动覆盖和分割视图支持
• 新的风景模式允许你可以水平编辑，特别是在iPad上
• 苹果触笔支持专为在iPadPro上的准确裁剪和压力敏感裁剪
• 三维触控支持专为在iPhone 6S或更高版本设备上的压力敏感裁剪。
• 新的手指裁剪工具让你可以艺术而得体地裁剪图片
• 9全新的调整工具，可以直接在编辑器当中使用，而且完全无损，包括：曝光度，对比度，饱和度，亮丽度，色温，色彩，渐变，模糊，阴影和高亮
• 8种基本图形滤镜，现在完全可逆
• 4倍更好的画质，现在在64位设备支持多达100个图层
• 用多种格式进行编辑：肖像，方形或风景
• 现在可以光速运行你的编辑
 
如果你喜欢Bazaart,请在AppStore给好评！谢谢。

Bazaart团队

• 我们修复了一些漏洞并且提高了应用程序的性能，您可以更好的体验Bazaart。

Bazaart 4.0:
我们很高兴带给你我们最大的更新。借助廣色域的力量和全新的64位canvas引擎，你會享受你從前從沒有看到過的華麗的充滿活力的顏色。最先進的創作工具，更快的處理時間，無與倫比的簡潔幫助你創作美麗的編輯，華麗的照片和震撼人心的拼貼。准備好發現無限的創造性。

• 在iPad Pro, iPhone 7和7Plus上用完全的广色域进行编辑
• 在iPad上享受多任务：滑动覆盖和分割视图支持
• 新的风景模式允许你可以水平编辑，特别是在iPad上
• 苹果触笔支持专为在iPadPro上的准确裁剪和压力敏感裁剪
• 三维触控支持专为在iPhone 6S或更高版本设备上的压力敏感裁剪。
• 新的手指裁剪工具让你可以艺术而得体地裁剪图片
• 9全新的调整工具，可以直接在编辑器当中使用，而且完全无损，包括：曝光度，对比度，饱和度，亮丽度，色温，色彩，渐变，模糊，阴影和高亮
• 8种基本图形滤镜，现在完全可逆
• 4倍更好的画质，现在在64位设备支持多达100个图层
• 用多种格式进行编辑：肖像，方形或风景
• 现在可以光速运行你的编辑
 
如果你喜欢Bazaart,请在AppStore给好评！谢谢。

Bazaart团队

We’re thrilled to bring to you a Bazaart special edition for Diwali, the Hindu "festival of lights".

• Get festive with Diwali themed templates <3
• Use beautiful Diwali inspired fonts. Namaste :)
• Apply amazing Diwali backgrounds!
• Celebrate the “festival of lights” with golden Diwali and hand sketched Mehndi stickers
• 我们修复了一些漏洞并且提高了应用程序的性能，您可以更好的体验Bazaart
 
如果你喜欢Bazaart,请在AppStore给好评！谢谢。

Bazaart团队

我们很高兴地推出Bazaart的圣诞特别版，迎接节日季的到来。希望你们喜欢！

• Get festive with Christmas themed templates <3
• Use beautiful Christmas inspired fonts. Yeepee!!!
• Apply amazing Xmas backgrounds :)
• Celebrate the season with Christmas and New Year’s stickers
• 我们修复了一些漏洞并且提高了应用程序的性能，您可以更好的体验Bazaart
 
如果你喜欢Bazaart,请在AppStore给好评！谢谢。

圣诞节快乐！
Bazaart团队

• 我们修复了一些漏洞并且提高了应用程序的性能，您可以更好的体验Bazaart
 
如果你喜欢Bazaart,请在AppStore给好评！谢谢。

Bazaart团队

We’re thrilled to introduce Bazaart Premium, our new subscription plan that will boost your creativity.

Bazaart is now a free app (yay!), with an an optional upgrade to a monthly, quarterly or yearly subscription, offered at very affordable prices. Our goal is to unlock creativity for everyone, and the new plan allows us to get Bazaart in the hands and hearts of more people around the world, while continuing to make the app better and better.

We also have a little surprise for you. During the holidays we worked to make one of your most frequent wishes come true - you can now modify text at any time!!! Enjoy :)

如果你喜欢Bazaart,请在AppStore给好评！谢谢。

Bazaart团队

Major bug fix! All’s well now.

PS
Existing users get a free upgrade to our Premium plan :)

Tap the Upgrade Now button to open the subscription plans screen.
At the bottom, you'll see the line "Already a Bazaart user? upgrade for free".
Tap it, enter you Apple ID with which you originally downloaded the app, and everything will unlock and be free to use for you forever.

Previously:
We’re thrilled to introduce Bazaart Premium, our new subscription plan that will boost your creativity.

Bazaart is now a free app (yay!), with an an optional upgrade to a monthly, quarterly or yearly subscription, offered at very affordable prices. Our goal is to unlock creativity for everyone, and the new plan allows us to get Bazaart in the hands and hearts of more people around the world, while continuing to make the app better and better.

We also have a little surprise for you. During the holidays we worked to make one of your most frequent wishes come true - you can now modify text at any time!!! Enjoy :)

如果你喜欢Bazaart,请在AppStore给好评！谢谢。

Bazaart团队

Bug fixes.

Previously:
We’re thrilled to introduce Bazaart Premium, our new subscription plan that will boost your creativity.

Bazaart is now a free app (yay!), with an an optional upgrade to a monthly, quarterly or yearly subscription, offered at very affordable prices. Our goal is to unlock creativity for everyone, and the new plan allows us to get Bazaart in the hands and hearts of more people around the world, while continuing to make the app better and better.

If you got the app before January 26th, you get a free upgrade to our Premium plan!
If you see the "Upgrade Now" banner, tap it, enter your Apple ID, and everything be free forever.
If not, you have already been upgraded automatically... No worries :)
 
We also have a little surprise for you. During the holidays we worked to make one of your most frequent wishes come true - you can now modify text at any time!!! Enjoy :)

如果你喜欢Bazaart,请在AppStore给好评！谢谢。

Bazaart团队

• You can now change the canvas size to create in a wide variety of sizes, with presets for social media posts and banners, standard photo formats and a even a fully custom size! Enjoy.
• A brand new dreamy font pack is now available for our Premium users.
• We fixed some bugs and improved performance so your Bazaart experience will be nothing short than great.

如果你喜欢Bazaart,请在App Store给好评！谢谢。

Bazaart团队

• New how-to GIFs help you learn how to cut out like a pro, in a jiffy!
• 我们修复了一些漏洞并且提高了应用程序的性能，您可以更好的体验Bazaart。

如果你喜欢Bazaart,请在App Store给好评！谢谢。

Bazaart团队

我们很高兴地为您带来此次巨大的更新，刚好赶上激动人心的iOS 11发布！

• Magically remove the background from photos taken with Depth camera on dual camera phones
• Drag and drop photo layers between projects
• Cut out photos artistically with the new shape cut-out tool
• Import photos from Files
• Zoom in and out in your project, to fine-tune the tiniest of details
• Blending adjustment allows you to artistically mesh your photos with the background
• Fill color adjustment allows you to color any layer in an opaque solid color
• Hide option in the layer organizer allows you to show/hide photo layers
• Smart justify layout was added to the text tool to provide a perfect multi-line text presentation.
• Change background is now much easier, available when tapping the background layer
• How-to GIFs help you learn how to cut out with the shapes and depth tools
• Added Korean support

如果你喜欢Bazaart,请在App Store给好评！谢谢。

我们很高兴为您带来Bazaart 6.0, 一个精彩的更新，以2019年开始！

所以，重大新闻是这些：
模板设计将让您的生活变得更加容易。有数百种华丽模板可供选择，从Instagram Stories到WhatsApp贴纸。在几秒钟内，您现在可以创建特殊的照片。模板整齐地分类，使您可以在需要时轻松找到所需内容，并我们不断添加新模板。

等等，还有更多！
• 全新而美观的软件外观设计将让您更方便地使用Bazaart
• 使用模板，项目和教程标签快速轻松地找到所需内容
• 使用彻底改进的魔术切割工具，快速删除人和宠物照片中的背景
• 只需点击照片即可替换任何模板中的照片
• 使用完全新设计的贴纸工具为添加精美的贴纸
• 通过新的指导教程了解如何像专业人士一样进行编辑
• 使用爱情主题背景，贴纸，字体，形状剪切和模板为了制作情人节贺卡

如果你喜欢Bazaart,请在App Store给好评！谢谢。

愿爱伴随着您，
Bazaart 团队
